Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Club Quarters St. Pauls, you'll be centrally located in London, steps from St. Paul's Cathedral and London Stock Exchange. This 4-star hotel is close to London Bridge and King's College London.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 265 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and express check-in. Planning an event in London? This hotel has 1840 square feet (171 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Club Quarters St. Pauls, you'll be centrally located in London, steps from St. Paul's Cathedral and London Stock Exchange. This 4-star hotel is close to London Bridge and King's College London.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

St. Paul's Cathedral - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
London Stock Exchange - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Old Bailey - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
St. Brides' Church - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Unilever PLC - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Dr. Johnsons' House - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
London Millennium Footbridge - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Blackfriars Bridge - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Museum of London - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Smithfield Market - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
London Temple Church - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
St. Etheldreda's - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Globe Theatre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
London Guildhall - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Tate Modern - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 24.6 km / 15.3 mi

The preferred airport for Club Quarters St. Pauls is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
